Full Description: FastFit360 offers a B2B cloud-based social communication solution for fashion workflow management. Our software makes it intuitive — even fun — for clothing brands to communicate and collaborate globally with their far-flung production partners. Our core technology enables a process we call e-sampling®. FastFit360 Cloud is used for global communication about fashion samples in a real-time, social media-type computing environment. FastFit® Studio is used for efficient sharing of consistent, high-quality, 360-degree images and videos of samples between global product development hubs. FastFit360 Analytics provides insight into key metrics such as turn time per sample, number of samples per style, and average product development time by factory.
